cards.name: Nebulon
cards.description: Nebulon is a majestic Pokemon clad in mysterious, galaxy-patterned armour. Found in deep, mysterious caves, Nebulon is the master of its domain, and is known for its formidable Psychic Nova ability. It spends its days nestled among the ancient walls, and its nights soaring through the night sky, crests glinting as it searches for new puzzles and explorations.
cards.image_prompt: Nebulon::0 a epic psychic-type book pokemon::2.5, wearing galaxy-pattern armor, in a cave environment, pink bokeh lighting, anime sketch --niji --ar 3:2
